id.FIXME: may be there, type not known (string? number?)
id.description: Unique id used to refer to this feature within this dataset, generated by database.

project_id.description: Project which this feature belongs to, managed by the database.

geojson_id.description: Id of the geojson for this feature, managed by the database.

source_name.description: Name of the original data source.

source_id.description: Id of the feature in original data source.

legal_name.description: Legal name used to identify this feature. Informational only.

include_in_energy_analysis.description: Include this building's energy use and cost in the analysis. Defaults to true. Fixed parameter.

weather_filename.description: Name of the EPW weather file for this building.  Defaults to site's weather_filename. Fixed parameter.

tariff_filename.description: Name of the IDF tariff file for this building.  Defaults to site's tariff_filename.  Fixed parameter.

surface_elevation.description: The surface elevation (above NAVD88 datum) of the building (ft).  This is the elevation of the ground at the building location, any below ground stories will be lower than this. Defaults to project's surface_elevation.  Fixed parameter.

mixed_type_1_percentage.description: Percentage of 1st mixed building space type. Fixed parameter. Only used when building_type is Mixed use.

mixed_type_2_percentage.description: Percentage of 2nd mixed building space type. Fixed parameter. Only used when building_type is Mixed use.

mixed_type_3_percentage.description: Percentage of 3rd mixed building space type. Fixed parameter. Only used when building_type is Mixed use.

mixed_type_4_percentage.description: Percentage of 4th mixed building space type. Fixed parameter. Only used when building_type is Mixed use.

number_of_stories.description: The maximum number of building stories, sum of number of above and below ground stories. Fixed parameter.

number_of_stories_above_ground.description: The number of building stories above ground. Defaults to number_of_stories.  Fixed parameter.

number_of_residential_units.description: Total number of residential units in the building. Required for residential buildings or mixed-use buildings with residential use types. Fixed parameter.

maximum_roof_height.description: Maximum height of the roof relative to surface elevation (ft)

roof_type.description: The basic roof geometry. Defaults to flat.  Fixed parameter.

year_built.description: The year construction of the building was completed. Defaults to current year. Fixed parameter.

footprint_area.description: Area of the footprint (ft^2).  Calculated on export.

footprint_perimeter.description: Perimeter of the footprint (ft). Calculated on export.

buildingType.description: Primary building space type. Fixed parameter. .
